function.name: struct
function.help: Like the StructNew function, the Struct function creates a new structure. The difference is that you can immediately initialize the contents of the structure by using this function. Example: struct(key1:"value 1', key2:struct(), key3: struct)

parameter.name: expression
parameter.help: A comma delimited list of key-value pairs. eg: key1:"value 1', key2:struct(), key3: struct
